Class MenuItem

java.lang.Object
cp213.MenuItem
public class MenuItem extends Object
Defines the name and tariff of a menu item. tariff is stored as a BigDecimal to avoid rounding errors.
Version:
2025-09-07
Author:
your name here, Abdul-Rahman Mawlood-Yunis, David Brown

  • Constructor Details

    • MenuItem

      public MenuItem(String name, BigDecimal tariff)
      Constructor. Must set tariff to 2 decimal points for calculations.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the menu item.
      tariff - cost of the menu item.

    • MenuItem

      public MenuItem(String name, double tariff)
      Alternate constructor. Converts a double tariff to BigDecimal.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the menu item.
      tariff - cost of the menu item.

    • toString

      public String toString()
